Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is the last one.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Your team's strategy of maintaining constant communication seems to be almost on par with the Engineering Force, even with the help of their thrusters."}
{3: 'Only one component remains.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "Sorry, but we've found it, too!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ignore them, Lee.', 3: '13'}
{3: 'One of the other Constructs stays behind and blocks Lee for a few seconds, giving the other Construct a chance to slip by the side of the cliff using the thrusters.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "Should've expected such tactics from a combat team. Guess I learned a thing or two.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even though Lee manages to juke the Construct blocking his way, the competition is still down to the wire.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Construct A', 3: 'We win!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct B', 3: 'Looks like we got the upper hand this time.', 4: '2'}
{3: "After grabbing the last part, the Construct returns to her companion's side. She extends her hand in a gesture of sportsmanship."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Who wouldn\'t have an "upper hand" with anti-gravity thrusters...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lee's response carries a sarcastic undertone, but he still shakes hands with his opponents in a friendly gesture."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory102.png'}
{3: 'You feel slightly annoyed with the other team for using high-speed support devices.'}
{3: "After all, the organizers probably didn't anticipate anyone going out of bounds and bypassing the side of the cliff. You feel helpless against their exploitation of a loophole."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "Hold on. Didn't we get the last bolt? Why does it look like the other parts...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct B', 3: 'Did you mess up?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct A', 3: "How's that possible? Would you have messed up?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Faced with the explanation by the organizer's staff, the Constructs share looks of dismay."}
{3: 'They repeatedly check the objects on the table only to realize they accidentally grabbed a duplicate bolt.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At that moment, Lee hands in the items you have collected.'}
{3: 'Surely enough, the last part lies in his palm.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like I still have a trick up my sleeve from playing magician all day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'When you shook their hands?', 3: '55'}
{2: "You weren't practicing beforehand, were you?", 3: '57'}
{2: 'You seem a little too good at that.', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...I just have quick hands.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After leaving his signature code at the end of the last report today, Lee closes the holo-screen.'}
{3: 'After rubbing the center of his brow, he clenches his fist, shakes his wrist, and opens his fingers. An intricate robot instantly appears in the palm of his hand.'}
{3: 'Lee opens a drawer stuffed with parts, ribbons, playing cards, and small robots of various shapes, and puts it in.'}
{3: 'Then he casually picks up the paper in front of him, holds it by the edge, and folds it several times. The celebration flyer becomes an intricate origami rose.'}
{3: 'Looking at the time, he furrows his eyebrows and quickly unfolds the paper with blistering speed.'}
{3: 'Folding it again, but this time faster, he checks his time, then puts the "rose" in the drawer.'}
{3: 'After moving his stiff joints, he takes out a bottle of lubricant and rubs it on his hands.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All that remains is...', 4: '1'}
